title: Episode #190: Helping Haiti Heal, A Fandom Charity Event
description:
• This audio file includes several special episodes of the Harry Potter fandomâ€™s favorite podcasts. MuggleCast kicks off this special four-hour event to help raise money for Haiti recovery efforts.
  • The Harry Potter Alliance has united with fan communities across the world, raising over $97,000 for Helping Haiti Heal! That money will charter an multiple cargo planes that will bring critical life-saving supplies to thousands of Haitians and more.
